sentences.sentence: On Sundays, she goes to Unitarian Universalist churches along the way.
sentences.translation: 星期天她会去沿途的一神信普救教堂。

sentences.sentence: Our guest turned out to be a lovely, thoughtful and smart Unitarian minister.
sentences.translation: 结果我们得知，客人是一位一神教的牧师，她可爱，体贴而聪慧。

sentences.sentence: Newton could not be Master of Trinity because he was a Unitarian and so not in Holy Orders.
sentences.translation: 牛顿不能做三一学院的教师，因为作为一名一神论者，他不能被授予神职。
